page.title: 01HAMSTREET SCHOOL
page.content:
Hamstreet School.
Hamstreet School is quite big with square buildings. Part of the school is very old, it is the original building,it is built of brick with small, high windows.The new building has much more glass and seems more roomy.There are ten classes.The school covers the ages of 5 years old to 11 years old. At dinner time we go into the biggest building of all and we have half an hour to eat our lunch.At play time we eat our crisps.We play cricket at our school and netball, rounders and football.I'm in the school football team.We also go swimming.We start at nine'o'clock and we end at 3.15 and our first play is at 10.45. Lunch time is at 12.00 o'clock.We have a last play time at 2.25.
